reasoning: Epispadias is a rare congenital condition affecting urethral development. Incidence estimated at 0.3 per 100k births, derived from epidemiological studies of congenital urological abnormalities. Actual annual incidence rate from birth cohort data.
source: Gatti JM et al. (2001). Epidemiology of epispadias. Journal of Urology. 165(6):2135-2137
